title: Things you guys Should expect in Platinum

replies.body:
I liked it, although it seemed a tad qq-ey. 
Nice voice as well

Want to duo?
I'm a G3 support; very willing to learn. 

... I like your voice :P.

I can play a couple of games with u on the weekend

Gotta prepare for an upcoming lan competition!

He sounds a bit Western...

OH %%%% HE'S ASIAN??
Let me know what you guys would like to see next!
well I heard its just another layer of bronze until you hit diamond pretty much
Only when u hit Diamond 1+ the bronze disappears
